meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mark Morrell Peggy Deschamps Bruce Cox Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1088.

td.p: Mark Morrell, an Air Force technical sergeant from Fayetteville, North Carolina
Peggy Deschamps, an accountant from Fairfield, California
Bruce Cox, an analyst from Lakeside, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $36,650)

tr.td: GEOGRAPHY
FAMOUS COUPLES
POETRY
THE SENSES
TV DETECTIVES
STUPID "HEAD"s
